card.name: Tibbers, Enchanted Bear SMR
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, exile the top 2 cards of your library you may play those cards as long you have cast another spell this turn.

card.name: Scarecrow Effigy SMR
card.text: All creatures able to block Scarecrow Effigy do so.

card.name: Maiden of the Mist SMR
card.text: If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die, exile that card and create a 2/2 black zombie creature token with decayed (This creature can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Quickblades SMR
card.text: When Quickblades enters, attach it to a creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and if Equipped creature has exactly 6 equipment attached to it, the creature gains an additional +2/+2. Equip {2}.

card.name: Grim Rose SMR
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice: Add 4 Mana of any combination of colors to your mana pool.

card.name: Ball SMR
card.text: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) Flying, haste Ball gains +1/+1 for each tapped artifact you control.

card.name: Wrong Neeko SMR
card.text: Wrong Neeko enters as a copy of a creature on the battlefield, except it keeps it’s name and it is legendary. Whenever Wrong Neeko takes damage, sacrifice it.

card.name: Puffcap SMR
card.text: When this creature dies, if it was dealt damage this turn, deal 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls
